items.sentence: Who told Tom to ask Mary to help John do that?
Tom told me that he\'s already read that book.
Tom told me that we\'re supposed to wait here.
Tom doesn\'t think he can get along with Mary.
I\'m sorry to be calling you so late at night.
Tom and Mary finished doing that on their own.
What\'s the stupidest thing you\'ve ever done?
Don\'t you want us to do something about that?
Tom pulled a map out of the glove compartment.
You should let Tom know that you can\'t drive.
You should probably tell Tom you can\'t do it.
Tom has been living in Boston for a long time.
Tom doesn\'t always do what he\'s supposed to.
That shouldn\'t take more than thirty minutes.
That was the first time I\'d ever lied to Tom.
That\'s something we should probably consider.
Have you been in touch with Tom since he left?
Have you considered going to school in Boston?
Tom said that he didn\'t want to study French.
Tom says he doesn\'t feel like doing that now.
Tom spends a lot of time practicing the piano.
I don\'t think Tom enjoys hanging out with us.
I don\'t think Tom will ever start doing that.
Do you really think it\'ll be hard to do that?
I worked at a car wash when I lived in Boston.
I worked really hard to get this done on time.
I would like to get better at speaking French.
Can you tell me what possessed you to do that?
I hope I can convince you to change your mind.
I hope that you and Tom will have a good time.
Tom has a compelling reason for avoiding Mary.
Was that the first time that you rode a horse?
I\'m getting pretty tired of your complaining.
Tom spent a lot of time checking his homework.
If everyone likes you, you\'re doing it wrong.
You might want to have someone look into that.
Tom couldn\'t convince Mary to come back home.
Tom and Mary really seem to be hitting it off.
I've told you a thousand times not to do that.
Tom isn't Mary's assistant. He's my assistant.
It's difficult to balance a ball on your nose.
The black telephone costs more than the white.
The royal family lives in the Imperial Palace.
Neither of those two students passed the test.
It has been twenty years since I saw you last.
I wasn't able to find out who that person was.
We're going to charge thirty dollars for this.
I still have things that I need to do in town.
The lava is destroying everything in its path.
Is Tom the only one here who can speak French?
